thread.section_title: Quicken Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quicken Loans | www.quickenloans.com | 6 of 287
thread.title: Paul Farrar
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by Paul Farrar

author: Paul Farrar
title: Paul Farrar
text:
Perhaps it was just our particular circumstances, but it would have been much easier just to send our complete income tax returns for two years in the beginning, rather than being told first to send the summary pages; then the Schedules; then the entire returns.
14 years of monthly automatic deposits for 2 pensions, plus another several years of automatic monthly Social Security deposits weren't adequate to prove those incomes? Instead, four entire bank statements were necessary. I'm just a lay person, but it just seemed overly cautious.
When it was all over, however, it wasn't so bad...and your employees with whom we dealt were always helpful, competent and friendly.
